works.description:
Development and maintenance of infrastructure as code with AWS CDK with pyhton and typscript following AWS Config best practices.

Design and implementation of cloud solutions to support internal and external applications (Cloudfront, s3, API Gateway, ACM, Lambda, Lambda Edge, WAF WebAcls, RDSs).

Management and operation of Kubernetes clusters in EKS

Design and implementation of GitHub Actions pipelines and actions for automating deployments, tests and package builds

Implementation of monitoring and alarming with Datadog

works.concept: Cloud DevOps Engineer in Cloud Team
works.description:
Development of internal tools (python, bash) for cloud infrastructure maintenance (EC2 instances, load balancers, EBS, VPCs, Route53, S3, ApiGateway, Lambda) on AWS and kubernetes (EKS + kubectl + k8s python). 
 Analyze, design and implement tasks automation and documentations of the Wazuh Cloud Servce. 
Design and reimplementation of internal management APIs. 
Designing new operational procedures to our internals tasks and data flows. 
Monitoring and tasks with Grafana, Promehetheus and Implementing alerting tasks with Lambda functions. 
Respond, resolve and scalete incidents.  
Elastic Stack operations (indice and clusters operations). 
On-Call duties. 
Manage users, groups, policies and roles for internal operations with IAM. 
Redesign and update Cloudformation stacks. 
Mentoring and Onboarding of new team members. 
Actively participate in the Wazuh Community. 
Collaborate with the entire Wazuh organization to solve issues related to orchestation and management tools and Cloud insights

Private classes for the development of native Android (Android Studio and Eclipse) and iOS (Xcode) mobile applications. 

 Development of Java applications, with Swing and JavaFX. Web Application Development with Java E2EE, JSF, Spring, Hibernate.

Deployment and cloud configurations (EC2, EMR, Lambda, Puppet, Ansible, OpenStack). 

Design, Administration and Maintenance of MySQL, PostgreSQL and MongoDB databases.

Creating neural networks with Tensorflow 

Containerisation (Docker) of applications and work environments. 

Integration and continuous deployment tools (Github Actions, Jenkins, CircleCI, Drone).

Class troubleshooting in C++, Java and Python.

Creation of static web pages.

Processing and p5.js exercises.

SQL queries
